name: Number Sense & Place Value
description: Develop counting, number relationships, and base-ten structure from concrete quantities through decimal understanding.

name: Operations & Algebraic Thinking
description: Build addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division fluency with an emphasis on strategies, structure, and early algebraic reasoning.

name: Fractions & Rational Numbers
description: Introduce unit fractions, equivalence, ordering, and operations connecting fractions to decimals and measurement contexts.

name: Measurement & Data
description: Measure attributes, tell time, work with money, and analyze data representations to solve real-world problems.

name: Geometry & Spatial Reasoning
description: Explore shapes, attributes, spatial relationships, and geometric measurement with progressive abstraction.

name: Patterns & Algebraic Thinking
description: Recognize, generalize, and represent patterns, relationships, and early functional thinking.
